Sql.query: INSERT INTO VCE_ENERGIA (pecacodi, PTOMEDICODI, CRMEFECHA, CRMEMEDITOTAL, CRMEH1, CRMEH2, CRMEH3, CRMEH4, CRMEH5, CRMEH6, CRMEH7, CRMEH8, CRMEH9, CRMEH10, CRMEH11, CRMEH12, CRMEH13, CRMEH14, CRMEH15, CRMEH16, CRMEH17, CRMEH18, CRMEH19, CRMEH20, CRMEH21, CRMEH22, CRMEH23, CRMEH24, CRMEH25, CRMEH26, CRMEH27, CRMEH28, CRMEH29, CRMEH30, CRMEH31, CRMEH32, CRMEH33, CRMEH34, CRMEH35, CRMEH36, CRMEH37, CRMEH38, CRMEH39, CRMEH40, CRMEH41, CRMEH42, CRMEH43, CRMEH44, CRMEH45, CRMEH46, CRMEH47, CRMEH48, CRMEH49, CRMEH50, CRMEH51, CRMEH52, CRMEH53, CRMEH54, CRMEH55, CRMEH56, CRMEH57, CRMEH58, CRMEH59, CRMEH60, CRMEH61, CRMEH62, CRMEH63, CRMEH64, CRMEH65, CRMEH66, CRMEH67, CRMEH68, CRMEH69, CRMEH70, CRMEH71, CRMEH72, CRMEH73, CRMEH74, CRMEH75, CRMEH76, CRMEH77, CRMEH78, CRMEH79, CRMEH80, CRMEH81, CRMEH82, CRMEH83, CRMEH84, CRMEH85, CRMEH86, CRMEH87, CRMEH88, CRMEH89, CRMEH90, CRMEH91, CRMEH92, CRMEH93, CRMEH94, CRMEH95, CRMEH96) SELECT {0},PTOMEDICODI, MEDIFECHA, MEDITOTAL, H1, H2, H3, H4, H5, H6, H7, H8, H9, H10, H11, H12, H13, H14, H15, H16, H17, H18, H19, H20, H21, H22, H23, H24, H25, H26, H27, H28, H29, H30, H31, H32, H33, H34, H35, H36, H37, H38, H39, H40, H41, H42, H43, H44, H45, H46, H47, H48, H49, H50, H51, H52, H53, H54, H55, H56, H57, H58, H59, H60, H61, H62, H63, H64, H65, H66, H67, H68, H69, H70, H71, H72, H73, H74, H75, H76, H77, H78, H79, H80, H81, H82, H83, H84, H85, H86, H87, H88, H89, H90, H91, H92, H93, H94, H95, H96 FROM ME_MEDICION96 WHERE TRUNC(MEDIFECHA) >= TO_DATE('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND TRUNC(MEDIFECHA) <= TO_DATE('{2}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND LECTCODI = 1 AND TIPOINFOCODI = 1
DELETE FROM VCE_ENERGIA WHERE TRUNC(CRMEFECHA) >= TO_DATE('{0}','DD/MM/YYYY') AND TRUNC(CRMEFECHA) <= TO_DATE('{1}','DD/MM/YYYY')
SELECT * FROM VCE_ENERGIA WHERE pecacodi = '{0}' ORDER BY CRMEFECHA ASC
